name: Jobbies on a Trolley (by Howdenhall)
description:
A game made in a series of Tinderbox game design & music workshops with school students from Howdenhall, who designed all of the gameplay,  levels, sound & music.

--

Play a series of minigames (using the arrow keys on your keyboard!) and collect the coins:

- Beat the timer

- Catch BoJo!

- Find all 5 items

- Master the platform maze & tower

--

Controls:

Move: Arrow keys (left, down, right)

Jump: Up

Double jump: Up tapped twice

Menu: Mouse to select

--

Thanks to:

The students & staff of Howdenhall Centre
